page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: ARABLE FARMING cont. The total amount of machinery is 13.They have 5 tractors,2 drillers,2 combines,and 2 ploughs.The combines are both German.They are CLAAS combines,pronounced 'class',as in 'class 1'.It has a main barn.The main barn has a ventilated floor,it holds 16 bays and 800 tons of wheat.It is 120 ft long and 50 ft wide.The area is 6050 sqft. The crops and fields have changed alot since 1840.They have less and bigger fields now and they only grow the main crops that make the most profit.It takes less time to combine, plough etc. because there are less hedges,boundaries etc. and so you don't have to keep stopping to go round them. In 1840 there were 92 fields.At present,there are 50 fields.
